title: Nerf poppy out of competitive play/playability
body: Seriously, what a boring champ that stalemates everything and punishes you for pressing your abilities, nerf that shit.

replies.body: Yeah, no. One of the most well designed champions in the game with great niche.

Of course they do, but if a champion has to go through that upon their release, they're generally not a very well designed champion.

Based on what? A champion being overnerfed just means they were a little bit strong at one point and Riot messed up the numbers when balancing them. The only thing Poppy being nerfed in the past indicates is that they made her numbers too high upon initial release.
Like old Poppy?
